description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. When zombies learn to fly, it's time to shoot them down!!  12 unlockable levels of flying zombie mayhem, with power ups, mines, bosses and coins to collect to buy upgrades. Are you good enough to reach the end.
